column2: English
Training
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE LOCATED THE CIVILIANS. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. BLACK HAWK DOWN. I REPEAT WE HAVE A BLACK HAWK DOWN. OVER.
ALPHA COPIES. PROCEEDING INTO THE CRASH SITE. STAND BY. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE AT THE BLACK HAWK CRASH SITE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE LOCATED THE CREW. BOTH OF THEM ARE ALIVE BUT WOUNDED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. ROGER THAT WE WILL SECURE THE CRASH SITE. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. THE AREA IS SECURE ENOUGH FOR SAR PACKAGE. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK CONFIRMS. THE AREA IS SECURE FOR SAR PACKAGE. SEND THEM IN. OVER.
GET READY ALPHA. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. WE BE ORBITING OVERHEAD. RADIO US WHEN YOU ARE READY. OVER.
THIS IS ECHO BLACK. EVERYBODY GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
LIFTOFF. WE ARE GOING HOME BOYS. ECHO OUT.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK. WE ARE APPROACHING THE CRASH SITE. DO NOT FIRE UPON US. OVER.
CHARLIE BLACK IS ON THE CRASH SITE. OVER.
CHARLIE BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE DONE HERE. OVER.
THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK SEVEN. CHARGES ARE SET. BLACK HAWK IS RIGGED TO BLOW. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. COPY. GET INTO THE CRASH SITE AS FAST AS YOU CAN. REPORT BACK WHEN YOU ARE THERE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. YOU MUST LOCATE THE HELO CREW. OVER.
GOOD WORK ALPHA. GET THEM TO YOUR SQUAD AND SECURE THE CRASH SITE UNTIL WE GET SAR PACKAGE TO YOU. I'LL BE IN TOUCH. PAPA BEAR OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. SAR PACKAGE IS READY. CALL US ON RADIO WHEN AREA IS SECURE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. ARE YOU SURE. YOU NEED TO BE SURE. CONFIRM OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY. SAR PACKAGE CALLSIGN CHARLIE BLACK IS ON THEIR WAY. HOLD TIGHT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. EXTRACTION CHINOOK IS ON THEIR WAY. GET TO THE TARGET AREA AND PREPARE FOR EXTRACTION. ALPHA GO GET THE CIVILIANS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. WELCOME HOME. OVER.
Op Liberty
Evacuate some civilians
